const (

    // RFC3339NanoSpace RFC3339 format, ns precision, space separator
    RFC3339NanoSpace string = "2006-01-02 15:04:05.999999999Z07:00"
)

type Alert ¶

Alert impelemnts a renewable alert timer 

type Alert struct {
    time.Duration
    *time.Timer
    Fired bool
}

type Tz ¶

Tz indicates what time zone to use 

type Tz byte
const (
    // UTC time zone
    UTC Tz = iota
    // LOCAL time zone
    LOCAL
)
